title: It’s always over quickly
itunes:title: It’s always over quickly
description:
I value your opinions, so let's jump right in. I'm a 34 year old of mother of 4 and when I say I have met the man of my dreams, I have! He is 55 years old and retired. He’s a gentleman, a great friend, he cooks and cleans and he works from time to time to keep busy. So here's my problem…

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
